para dravya apaharaṇam cauryāt vā atha balena vā

sarvatra maithuna tyāgam brahmacaryam pracakṣate
dravyāṇām api anādānam āpadi api yathā icchayā

vedānta śatarudrīya praṇava ādi japam budhāḥ

original: cintanaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ mānasaṃ taṃ japaṃ viduḥ // KūrmP_2,11.26 //

original: prāksaṃskārāt trirātraṃ syāt tasmādūrdhvaṃ daśāhakam // KūrmP_2,23.10 //

original: yadi syāt sūtake sūtirmaraṇe vā mṛtirbhavet /

original: bhuvanānāṃ svarūpaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ ca niveśanam /
analyzed: bhuvanānām sva rūpam ca jyotiṣām ca niveśanam

original: kīrtyante caiva varṣāṇi nadīnāṃ caiva nirṇayaḥ // KūrmP_2,44.109 //
analyzed: kīrtyante ca eva varṣāṇi nadīnām ca eva nirṇayaḥ

original: parvatānāṃ ca kathanaṃ sthānāni ca divaukasām /
analyzed: parvatānām ca kathanam sthānāni ca divaukasām
dvīpānām pravibhāgaḥ ca śvetadvīpa upavarṇanam
śayanam keśavasya atha māhātmyam ca mahātmanaḥ
manvantarāṇām kathanam viṣṇoḥ māhātmyam eva ca
veda śākhā praṇayanam vyāsānām kathanam tatas

original: avedasya ca vedānāṃ kathanaṃ munipuṅgavāḥ // KūrmP_2,44.112 //
analyzed: a vedasya ca vedānām kathanam muni puṅgavāḥ

original: yogeśvarāṇāṃ ca kathā śiṣyāṇāṃ cātha kīrtanam /
analyzed: yoga īśvarāṇām ca kathā śiṣyāṇām ca atha kīrtanam
gītāḥ ca vividha aguhyāḥ īśvarasya atha kīrtitāḥ
varṇa āśramāṇām ācārāḥ prāyaścitta vidhiḥ tatas

original: kapālitvaṃ ca rudrasya bhikṣācaraṇameva ca // KūrmP_2,44.114 //
analyzed: kapāli tvam ca rudrasya bhikṣā caraṇam eva ca
pativratāyāḥ ca ākhyānam tīrthānām ca vinirṇayaḥ

original: tathā maṅkaṇakasyātha nigrahaḥ kīrtyate dvijāḥ // KūrmP_2,44.115 //
analyzed: tathā maṅkaṇakasya atha nigrahaḥ kīrtyate dvijāḥ

original: vadhaśca kathito viprāḥ kālasya ca samāsataḥ /
analyzed: vadhaḥ ca kathitaḥ viprāḥ kālasya ca samāsatas

original: devadāruvane śaṃbhoḥ praveśo mādhavasya ca // KūrmP_2,44.116 //
analyzed: devadāru vane śaṃbhoḥ praveśaḥ mādhavasya ca
darśanam ṣaṭkulīyānām devadevasya dhīmataḥ

original: varadānaṃ ca devasya nandine tu prakīrtitam // KūrmP_2,44.117 //
analyzed: vara dānam ca devasya nandine tu prakīrtitam
naimittikaḥ tu kathitaḥ pratisargaḥ tatas param

original: prākṛtaḥ pralayaścordhvaṃ sabījo yoga eva ca // KūrmP_2,44.118 //
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ pralayaḥ ca ūrdhvam sa bījaḥ yogaḥ eva ca

original: evaṃ jñātvā purāṇasya saṃkṣepaṃ kīrtayet tu yaḥ /
analyzed: evam jñātvā purāṇasya saṃkṣepam kīrtayet tu yaḥ
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma loke mahīyate
evam uktvā śriyam devīm ādāya puruṣottamaḥ

original: saṃtyajya kūrmasaṃsthānaṃ svasthānaṃ ca jagāma ha // KūrmP_2,44.120 //
analyzed: saṃtyajya kūrma saṃsthānam sva sthānam ca jagāma ha

original: devāśca sarve munayaḥ svāni sthānāni bhejire /
analyzed: devāḥ ca sarve munayaḥ svāni sthānāni bhejire

original: praṇamya puruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ gṛhītvā hyamṛtaṃ dvijāḥ // KūrmP_2,44.121 //
analyzed: praṇamya puruṣam viṣṇum gṛhītvā hi amṛtam dvijāḥ
etat purāṇam paramam bhāṣitam kūrma rūpiṇā
sākṣāt deva ādidenena viṣṇunā viśvayoninā

original: yaḥ paṭhet satataṃ martyo niyamena samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet satatam martyaḥ niyamena samāhitaḥ
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma loke mahīyate

original: likhitvā caiva yo dadyād vaiśākhe māsi suvrataḥ /
analyzed: likhitvā ca eva yaḥ dadyāt vaiśākhe māsi suvrataḥ

original: viprāya vedaviduṣe tasya puṇyaṃ nibodhata // KūrmP_2,44.124 //
analyzed: viprāya veda viduṣe tasya puṇyam nibodhata
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ sarva aiśvarya samanvitaḥ
bhuktvā ca vipulān svarge bhogān divyān su śobhanān

original: tataḥ svargāt paribhraṣṭo viprāṇāṃ jāyate kule /
analyzed: tatas svargāt paribhraṣṭaḥ viprāṇām jāyate kule
pūrva saṃskāra māhātmyāt brahma vidyām avāpnuyāt
paṭhitvā adhyāyam eva ekam sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: yor'thaṃ vicārayet samyak sa prāpnoti paraṃ padam // KūrmP_2,44.127 //
analyzed: yaḥ ṛtham vicārayet samyak sa prāpnoti param padam
adhyetavyam idam nityam vipraiḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi
śrotavyam ca dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ mahāpātaka nāśanam
ekatas tu purāṇāni sa itihāsāni kṛtsnaśas
ekatra ca idam paramam etat eva atiricyate
dharma naipuṇya kāmānām jñāna naipuṇya kāminām

original: idaṃ purāṇaṃ muktvaikaṃ nāstyanyat sādhanaṃ param // KūrmP_2,44.130 //
analyzed: idam purāṇam muktvā ekam na asti anyat sādhanam param
yathāvat atra bhagavān devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ

original: kathyate hi yathā viṣṇurna tathānyeṣu suvratāḥ // KūrmP_2,44.131 //
analyzed: kathyate hi yathā viṣṇuḥ na tathā anyeṣu suvratāḥ
brāhmī paurāṇikī ca iyam saṃhitā pāpa nāśanī

original: atra tat paramaṃ brahma kīrtyate hi yathārthataḥ // KūrmP_2,44.132 //
analyzed: atra tat paramam brahma kīrtyate hi yathārthataḥ

original: tīrthānāṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tapasāṃ ca paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: tīrthānām paramam tīrtham tapasām ca param tapaḥ

original: jñānānāṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ vratānāṃ paramaṃ vratam // KūrmP_2,44.133 //
analyzed: jñānānām paramam jñānam vratānām paramam vratam
na adhyetavyam idam śāstram vṛṣalasya ca sannidhau

original: yo 'dhīte sa tu mohātmā sa yāti narakān bahūn // KūrmP_2,44.134 //
analyzed: yaḥ dhīte sa tu moha ātmā sa yāti narakān bahūn

original: śrāddhe vā daivike kārye śrāvaṇīyaṃ dvijātibhiḥ /
analyzed: śrāddhe vā daivike kārye śrāvaṇīyam dvijātibhiḥ
yajña ante tu viśeṣeṇa sarva doṣa viśodhanam
mumukṣūṇām idam śāstram adhyetavyam viśeṣataḥ
śrotavyam ca atha mantavyam veda artha paribṛṃhaṇam
jñātvā yathāvat vipra indrān śrāvayet bhakti saṃyutān
sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma sāyujyam āpnuyāt
śraddadhāne puruṣe dadyāt ca adhārmike tathā

original: sa pretya gatvā nirayān śunāṃ yoniṃ vrajatyadhaḥ // KūrmP_2,44.138 //
analyzed: sa pretya gatvā nirayān śunām yonim vrajati adhas
namaskṛtvā harim viṣṇum jagadyonim sanātanam
adhyetavyam idam śāstram kṛṣṇadvaipāyanam tathā
iti ājñā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ
pārāśaryasya viprarṣeḥ vyāsasya ca mahātmanaḥ
śrutvā nārāyaṇāt divyām nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: gautamāya dadau pūrvaṃ tasmāccaiva parāśaraḥ // KūrmP_2,44.141 //
analyzed: gautamāya dadau pūrvam tasmāt ca eva parāśaraḥ
parāśaraḥ gaṅgādvāre muni īśvarāḥ
munibhyaḥ kathayāmāsa dharma kāma artha mokṣa dam

original: brahmaṇā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ sanakāya ca dhīmate /
analyzed: brahmaṇā kathitam pūrvam sanakāya ca dhīmate
sanatkumārāya tathā sarva pāpa praṇāśanam
sanakāt bhagavān sākṣāt devalaḥ yoga vittamaḥ
avāptavān pañcaśikhaḥ devalāt idam uttamam
sanatkumārāt bhagavān muniḥ satyavatī sutaḥ

original: lebhe purāṇaṃ paramaṃ vyāsaḥ sarvārthasaṃcayam // KūrmP_2,44.145 //
analyzed: lebhe purāṇam paramam vyāsaḥ sarva artha saṃcayam
tasmāt vyāsāt aham śrutvā bhavatām pāpa nāśanam

original: ūcivān vai bhavadbhiśca dātavyaṃ dhārmike jane // KūrmP_2,44.146 //
analyzed: ūcivān vai bhavadbhiḥ ca dātavyam dhārmike jane
tasmai vyāsāya gurave sarvajñāya mahā ṛṣaye
pārāśaryāya śāntāya namaḥ nārāyaṇa ātmane

original: yasmāt saṃjāyate kṛtsanaṃ yatra caiva pralīyate /
analyzed: yasmāt saṃjāyate kṛtsanam yatra ca eva pralīyate
namaḥ tasmai sureśāya viṣṇave kūrma rūpiṇe
iti śrī kūrmapurāṇe ṣaṭsāhastryām saṃhitāyām upari vibhāge catuścatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
upari vibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ
iti śrī kūrmapurāṇam samāptam
